title: Bahar
overview: When Bahar comes face to face with death, she will encounter another face of her family, especially her husband Timur, who seems 'perfect' from the outside. With Bahar's sudden illness, all dynamics in the family will change. In this process, Evren will be Timur's rival in every sense. Bahar's reconstruction of her life will instill hope in the audience, often with tragicomic stories.
